item.description:
Duncan, of the Boston Area Writers' Commiseration Circle, offers members the chance to visit his group. Here's what he says about it:

There is another writers group (a new one) Called Boston Area Writers' Commiseration Circle. It fills a gap because it allows writers to [share] some about their writing & writers block, publishing hurdles, etc.

Place: Field Pub back patio. The back patio has been a very popular place for Meetups this past summer. (If rain, the Field also has a nice indoor back room).

http://thefieldpub.com/

Check it out if this sounds like something that would complement your writing!
item.name: Cross-Group Meetup with Boston Area Writers' Commiseration Circle
